title: DDos Like a Pro
body: Just had an URF game where a member on the enemy team was having such a bad game (AP Nidalee 0/9/0 after 20 mins), that they decided to DDos the server to 'teach everyone a lesson'. Are people that sad to DDos these days, and then even in URF mode? Lol

replies.body: tell them to nek themselves. if they are 0-9 as nidalee in urf they should uninstall and never use the internet ever again but if they actually ddos cos they suck that bad then they are truly a failure at life
Tell them to kill themselves?  Seriously?  wtf???

> [{quoted}](name=PrisonBus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tfvQkUxy,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-04-13T09:01:49.900+0000)

> Tell them to kill themselves?  Seriously?  wtf???

what's so shocking boss?
Sooooooooo they going to ddos league with what, their internet speed? haha unlikely
the only lesson to be taught is with using one's fist and breaking some jaws
Anything for a win man...I'd prefer to earn it though...
